attributes.action: Create safe, legal routes for displaced Ukrainians to seek refuge in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The UK has no legal routes for Ukrainians fleeing the war to seek refuge here. They are unable to legally travel without a visa, effectively cutting off legal migration routes and forcing them into the hands of people traffickers.

The immigration minister suggested that displaced Ukrainians can apply for 6 month work visas to come and pick fruit. This is an embarrassing and shameful response. We must stand side-by-side with the people of Ukraine, welcoming displaced refugees with open arms.
attributes.background: The UK should create safe and legal migration routes for Ukrainian nationals displaced by war, allowing them to seek refuge and safe haven in the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
